code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserFiles=_ref=>{let{token}=_ref;const[userFiles,setUserFiles]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{if(!token){setMessage('No token, please log in.');return;}const fetchUserFiles=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/files/user-files',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setUserFiles(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching user files:',error);setMessage('Error fetching user files');}};fetchUserFiles();},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Uploaded Files"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),userFiles.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No files uploaded yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:userFiles.map(file=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"http://localhost:5000/uploads/".concat(file.filename),target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:file.filename})},file._id))})]});};export default UserFiles;
